channel.title: [pi]dueling

item.title: [pi]dueling
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

hello, I need a command for duel requests. so it would be like ::duel (name)
example: ::duel player1

I thought I could do it like this

if (playerCommand.startsWith("duel")) { requestDuel(); }
and I thought it would work, since the void is made in the TradeAndDuel class.
but I get an error saying it can’t identify the variable…help?

Read full topic
